OCC: For the all that is holy in the universe please do not try to say were 
related.

::Liono::
Liono growls "Feh! I have no clue who his grandmother is nor do I care for 
stories. If I am talked about in the future let them speak of the days when 
I was a evil just as well as the days that I was good and let mortals judge 
me accordingly for my good and evil deeds." Liono refolds his arms "I am 
that is!" Liono calmly laughs "If your grandmother told my story correct you 
should understand that with out question."
